qrList.label: init
qrList.message:
/echo Initializing |

/run varname=lvl creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq {: /setvar key=lvl 0 :} |

/if left=lvl right=0 rule=gt {: /abort :} |

/buttons labels=["Normal","Hard"] Select difficulty |
/if left={{pipe}} right=Normal rule=eq else={: /setvar key=hardmode true :} {: /setvar key=hardmode false :} |

/if left=hardmode right=true rule=eq else={:
  /setvar key=linescale 2 | /setvar key=hp 5
:}
{:
  /setvar key=linescale 0.2 | /setvar key=hp 3
:} |

/setvar key=lvl 0 |
/setvar key=cooldown 2 |
/setvar key=angle 0 |
/setvar key=mapw 500 |
/setvar key=maph 400 | /setvar key=line |
/setvar key=encounter false |

/setvar key=tanksmoke https://creamsan.neocities.org/files/assets/tanksmoke.gif |

/setvar key=i 0 |
/times 4 {:
  /addvar key=i 1 |
  /setvar key="tank{{getvar::i}}" https://creamsan.neocities.org/files/assets/tank{{getvar::i}}.png |
  /setvar key="tank{{getvar::i}}gun" https://creamsan.neocities.org/files/assets/tank{{getvar::i}}gun.png |
  /setvar key="enemy{{getvar::i}}smoke" hidden |
  /setvar key="enemy{{getvar::i}}tank" hidden
:} |

/setvar key=tank1gunxoffset 13 |
/setvar key=tank1gunyoffset 41 |
/setvar key=tank1xoffset 18 |
/setvar key=tank1yoffset 30 |

/setvar key=tank2gunxoffset 13 |
/setvar key=tank2gunyoffset 25 |
/setvar key=tank2xoffset 18 |
/setvar key=tank2yoffset 33 |

/setvar key=tank3gunxoffset 13 |
/setvar key=tank3gunyoffset 40 |
/setvar key=tank3xoffset 18 |
/setvar key=tank3yoffset 33 |

/setvar key=tank4gunxoffset 13 |
/setvar key=tank4gunyoffset 55 |
/setvar key=tank4xoffset 18 |
/setvar key=tank4yoffset 33 |

/setvar key=tanksmokexoffset 100 |
/setvar key=tanksmokeyoffset 180 |

/setvar index=1 key=chancesnormal 4 |
/setvar index=2 key=chancesnormal 3 |
/setvar index=3 key=chancesnormal 8 |
/setvar index=4 key=chancesnormal 6 |
/setvar index=5 key=chancesnormal 12 |
/setvar index=6 key=chancesnormal 9 |
/setvar index=7 key=chancesnormal 12 |
/setvar index=8 key=chancesnormal 8 |

/setvar index=1 key=chanceshard 3 |
/setvar index=2 key=chanceshard 2 |
/setvar index=3 key=chanceshard 6 |
/setvar index=4 key=chanceshard 4 |
/setvar index=5 key=chanceshard 9 |
/setvar index=6 key=chanceshard 6 |
/setvar index=7 key=chanceshard 8 |
/setvar index=8 key=chanceshard 6 |

/setvar index=1 key=lvlenemycount 1 |
/setvar index=2 key=lvlenemycount 1 |
/setvar index=3 key=lvlenemycount 2 |
/setvar index=4 key=lvlenemycount 2 |
/setvar index=5 key=lvlenemycount 3 |
/setvar index=6 key=lvlenemycount 3 |
/setvar index=7 key=lvlenemycount 4 |
/setvar index=8 key=lvlenemycount 4 |

/setvar key=distances index=0 200 |
/setvar key=distances index=1 250 |
/setvar key=distances index=2 300 |
/setvar key=distances index=3 350 |
/setvar key=distances index=4 385 |

/setvar key=200 index=maxangle 85 |
/setvar key=200 index=precision 4 |
/setvar key=200 index=maxspeed 10 |

/setvar key=250 index=maxangle 50 |
/setvar key=250 index=precision 3 |
/setvar key=250 index=maxspeed 5 |

/setvar key=300 index=maxangle 40 |
/setvar key=300 index=precision 2 |
/setvar key=300 index=maxspeed 5 |

/setvar key=350 index=maxangle 30 |
/setvar key=350 index=precision 2 |
/setvar key=350 index=maxspeed 2 |

/setvar key=385 index=maxangle 25 |
/setvar key=385 index=precision 1 |
/setvar key=385 index=maxspeed 2

qrList.label: userprocess
qrList.message:
/setvar key=userinput {{input}} |

/if left=hp right=0 rule=lte {:
  /setvar key=jbout - | /echo It's over. Use the normal Send button. | /abort
:} |

/if left=lvl right=8 rule=gte {:
  /setvar key=jbout - | /echo It's over. Use the normal Send button. | /abort
:} |


/let scanenemies {:
	/setvar key=i 0 |
	/times {{getvar::enemycount}} {: /run {{getvar::enemyprocess}} :}
:} |

/let resetenemy {:
	/addvar key=i 1 |
	/setvar key="enemy{{getvar::i}}smoke" hidden |
	/setvar key="enemy{{getvar::i}}tank" hidden
:} |

/let genenemy {:
	/getvar index={{getvar::i}} arr |
	/setvar key=dist | /setvar key=distkey {{pipe}} |
	
	/addvar key=i 1 |
	/setvar key="enemy{{getvar::i}}dist" {{getvar::dist}} |
	
	/getvar index=maxangle {{getvar::distkey}} |
	/setvar key=minmax |
	/rand from="-{{getvar::minmax}}" to={{getvar::minmax}} round=round |
	/setvar key="enemy{{getvar::i}}currangle" |
	
	/getvar index=maxspeed {{getvar::distkey}} |
	/setvar key=minmax |
	/rand from="-{{getvar::minmax}}" to={{getvar::minmax}} round=round |
	/setvar key="enemy{{getvar::i}}speed" |
	
	/setvar key="enemy{{getvar::i}}tank" visible
:} |

/let genenemies {:
	/if left=lvl right=8 rule=gte {: /break :} |

	/addvar key=lvl 1 |
	/setvar key=enemyprocess resetenemy |
	/run scanenemies |
	/setvar key=arr {{getvar::distances}} |
	/run creamsan.shuffle |
	
	/getvar index={{getvar::lvl}} lvlenemycount |
	/setvar key=enemycount | /setvar key=enemyremaining |
	/setvar key=enemyprocess genenemy |
	/run scanenemies |
	
	/setvar key=jbout Enemy spotted. Number of enemies: {{getvar::enemycount}}. Prepare for battle. Include the following codeblock in the response: ```
BEGIN BATTLE
``` |
	
	/if left=hardmode right=true rule=eq else={:
	  /getvar index={{getvar::lvl}} chancesnormal |
	  /setvar key=chances
	:}
	{:
	  /getvar index={{getvar::lvl}} chanceshard |
	  /setvar key=chances
	:}
:} |


/setvar key=log Event log: |
/setvar key=jbout No enemies for now. |
/if left=cooldown right=0 rule=lte {: /run genenemies :} |
/addvar key=cooldown -1 |

/run teamneko.detectencounter |
/if left=encounter right=true rule=eq {:
  /run teamneko.aimloop |
  /setvar key=cooldown {{random: 0,1}} |
  /setvar key=encounter false
:} |

/flushvar nadanada

qrList.label: aimloop
-- aimloop
rolltakedmg
qrList.message:
/pass {{roll: d3}} |
/if left={{pipe}} right=2 rule=gte {:
  /addvar key=hp -1 | /max 0 hp |
  /setvar key=hp |
  /setvar key=log {{getvar::log}}{{newline}}- The crew's tank has taken damage during the battle.
- Miki is angry and wants to shoot more at defeated enemy tanks.
- Emi pretends to be scared and hugs {{user}}-chan, but grabs her boobs.
- Ayame continues to drive, but blushes and steals glances. |
  /echo severity=warning You have taken damage.
:}

qrList.label: gameover
qrList.message:
/popup
| /setvar key=jbout Game over. Their tank has been disabled by their opponent. They are eliminated from the match.

qrList.label: winbattle
qrList.message:
/setvar key=looping false |
/setvar key=jbout The team won the battle. They have defeated {{getvar::enemycount}} enemy tank(s). But they still have a long way to go to reunite with the main group.

{{getvar::log}} |
/echo severity=success You've won the battle. |
/if left=lvl right=8 rule=gte {: /run teamneko.showendingpopup :}

qrList.label: showendingpopup
qrList.message:
/popup

Congratulations





Thanks for checking out my card. If you've made it this far, it means that the script is working as intended, I really hope so. If you encountered any problems, please let me know.
From this point on you should use the normal send button on the right instead of the QR send button.


| /setvar key=jbout The crew survived and managed to rejoin with the main squad. It seems that they also wiped out the opposing teams, so they won the match. {{getvar::log}}

qrList.label: detectencounter
-- detectencounter
